title: NewOrleans
body:
<<set $NO = true>>
Good ol' New Orleans.

Feels like it's been forever.

Everything looks different. But the tunes -

The tunes are still the same.

Not much left to do but go back home to Storyville.

[[Go home|WalkHome]]

title: WalkHome
body:
On the road home you see a familiar face.

Familiar Face: Jazz! Hey Jazz!!

[[Ignore them:|GetHome]]

[[Jazz: Hey!|TalkToFriend]]

title: TalkToFriend
body:
Familiar Face: How's the world been treatin' ya, kid? 

Familiar Face: The bull been keepin their mitts off of ya?

[[Jazz: You know it, pal! How's New Orleans been?|TalkToFriend2]]

[[Jazz: The world's what it is. Copacetic one day, down in the dumps the other|TalkToFriend2]]

title: TalkToFriend2
body:
Familiar Face: Can't be helped, I suppose.

Familiar Face: Say, you still remember the ol' New Orleans Jam?

[[Jazz: I do, why?|TalkToFriend3]]

title: TalkToFriend3
body:
Familiar Face: Got a minute to play with an old pal?

[[Jazz: I should get home|GetHome]]

[[Jazz: For sure!|TalkToFriend4]]

title: TalkToFriend4
body:
Familiar Face: Alright, let's do this!

[[Play a saxophone|NewOrleansFail]]

[[Play the clarient|NewOrleansWin]]

title: NewOrleansFail
body:
Familiar Face: That's not how we do it in New Orleans! You've changed Jazz.

[[Go home|GetHome]]

title: NewOrleansWin
body:
Familiar Face: That's how you do it! You've changed, but you still remember your roots!

Familiar Face: Here, have this

YOU HAVE RECEIVED THE SPIRIT OF JAZZ

Familiar Face: Give my regards to your folks

[[Go home|GetHome]]

<<set $inventory = $inventory+1>>
<<set $vanilla = false>>
